page.title: 01Introducing our grid
page.content: Our 3 by 4 kilometre block includes {Penshurst, Speldhurst}and a tiny part of{Bidborough.}We have done most of the work in Penshurst. It is a very famous village because of Penshurst Place, the home of Lord De L'Isle. His famous family have lived here for many years. { Penshurst}is a very historic village. It has an old blacksmiths which is now a garage, two tea rooms, a newsagents and a village stores. The newest part of Penshurst is called Latymers; it used to be one big house with enormous grounds. Penshurst has a population of 200 to 300 people. It has lots of families that have lived here for generations e.g. Hazeldine, Jenner, Card, Cole and Hardinge are some of them. Penshurst is situated near Tunbridge Wells in Kent.
